page.title: 07WORK IN THE MILLS LEEK
page.content: My Dad works at Victoria Mills .At first he drove lorries but now he's the boss of the Warehouse.When I walk through the warehouse I look all around ,it looks nice.All of the different colours red,blue,white,yellow,orange and some are like Blackpool Rock!The things they make are scarves ,hats,gloves and fingerless gloves in bright flourecent colours.I've got some orange flourecent fingerless gloves.Also I've got a cream scarf and hat that match.They also make bob hats with football teams names on.I've got one with Manchester United on it .
